author: kn:ez.no
msg: - Missed to commit font type exception file.
- Added more verbose text for font rendering exception.

author: kn:ez.no
msg: - Use Free Type 2 by default now, fallback to native ttf, if not available
- Use t1lib for PostScript Type1 fonts
- Throw an exception, if some texts could not be rendered with minimum font

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Fixed bug #8959: GD and ImageMagick crop filters behave differently.
# Note that the GD driver now behaves like the ImageMagick driver and reduces
# the crop dimensions, if they are larger than the source image dimensions.
# The test case ezcImageConversionFiltersGdTest::testCrop_3() has been adjusted
# to be the same as for the ImageMagick driver so that no new test case is
